trends: There has been one other sighting in Oneonta
There were no other sightings in Oneonta on or around February 16th 2012
Summary: driving,looked up, looked like bronze hat tilted slightly with reflection on right side top,looked at it while driving for 20 seconds pulled off road with cell phone to take pic, gone before could take pic.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving down the road with my window down when i looked up and saw a bronze hat tilted slightly with a reflection from the sun hitting the right side top of the craft. i watched it for about 20 seconds. i saw a place to pull off the road so i pulled in fast got out with my cell phone to take a pic and to was gone. i was exited this was my first daylight sighting, i had witnessed on 4 other occasions at night strange things in the sky but to see daytime sighting was very exiting.
